Title: Democratic Congressman: Opposition To Executive Action Result Of ‰ÛÏPerson Of Color Being In The WhiteåÊHouse‰Ûù
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cSo but again, this is just a reaction in Bennie Thompson\xe2\x80\x99s words to a person of color being in the White House.\xe2\x80\x9d']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'A Democratic congressman says opposition to President Obama\xe2\x80\x99s extending temporary legal status to millions of undocumented immigrants is a result of the president\xe2\x80\x99s race.', '\xe2\x80\x9cThe president, by executive order, which everybody agrees \xe2\x80\x94 who has a real brain \xe2\x80\x94 that presidents since George Washington have had executive authority privilege to do certain things,\xe2\x80\x9d said Rep. Bennie Thompson of Mississippi on On Joe Madison\xe2\x80\x99s radio program', 'last Friday.', '\xe2\x80\x9cHe\xe2\x80\x99s not doing anything that the Bushes, the Reagans, the Clintons, and other presidents all the way back to Eisenhower, as it addressed immigration. So but again, this is just a reaction in Bennie Thompson\xe2\x80\x99s words to a person of color being in the White House.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'This isn\xe2\x80\x99t the first time Thompson has said opposition to specific policies from President Obama is because of his race.', 'In an interview', 'program in April, Thompson said Republicans are only anti-big government and anti-Obamacare because President Obama is black.', 'Democratic Congressman: Opposition To Executive Action Result Of "Person Of Color Being In The White House"', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! You'll get your first email soon.", 'Thanks for sharing.', 'Please try again later.']

Title: Key Signature From Con Man‰Ûªs Ebola Firm May BeåÊFake
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', 'Bio-Recovery, the firm New York City hired to clean up Ebola, has a \xe2\x80\x9cchief safety officer\xe2\x80\x9d who is a con artist and convicted felon. Now, BuzzFeed News has learned, there are questions about the CEO\xe2\x80\x99s signature on a corporate document. And the con artist has changed his name.', 'A routine corporate document, filed in January of this year,', 'that Christine Dye is the chief executive officer and president of Bio-Recovery Corporation. Her signature is affixed to the bottom of the page.', 'And, indeed, a woman named Christina Dye worked for the company at that time. But her signature, found in a', 'for another company, does not match the one on the Bio-Recovery papers.', 'When she started working with Pane, Dye told BuzzFeed News, he promised to make her CEO in a year. But she left after six months, she said, and was never Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s CEO or president. She said the signature on the Bio-Recovery document is not hers.', 'As for the slight difference in names \xe2\x80\x94 Christine versus Christina \xe2\x80\x94 Dye said she knows of no other person with her surname who worked at the company, and BuzzFeed News did not find any other Dye associated with the company in public records or online.', 'The dueling signatures are the latest revelation about Bio-Recovery, the company New York City hired to clean up the apartment of Ebola patient Dr. Craig Spencer. As a recent', 'revealed, a con artist and convicted felon named Sal Pane has said he\xe2\x80\x99s the company\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cchief safety officer,\xe2\x80\x9d and he has been all over the media, often making exaggerated or false claims about his and Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s credentials.', '\xe2\x80\x9cFor the past 27 years the company\xe2\x80\x99s been around we\xe2\x80\x99ve never had an issue,\xe2\x80\x9d Pane told Fox News. But the company has only been around for 16 years, and 27 years before he made that statement, Pane was just 4 years old. When the company decontaminated Spencer\xe2\x80\x99s apartment, it arrived', '.', 'Before the Ebola cleanup, Pane ran a mortgage company that scammed its customers. In 2010, a judge found Pane', 'and ordered that he and the company pay $12.5 million in restitution and civil penalties. So far, only about $62,000 has been paid back. That same year, after a drunk driving incident, Pane was', 'of false personation, driving while impaired, and felony aggravated unlicensed operation of a vehicle.', 'Today, the difference between Christine and Christina Dye is not the only mystery involving names. When Pane ran his mortgage company, he went by his', ': Pane. Now, however, he spells it slightly differently: Pain.', 'But, it turns out, neither of those may be his legal name. In 2010 he', 'it to Enzo Pagani.', 'When BuzzFeed News called Pane this week to ask him about the differing signatures and his name change, he hung up. Neither he nor Bio-Recovery responded to a list of detailed questions sent to various email and physical addresses associated with Pane and the company.', 'If Christina Dye did not sign the Bio-Recovery document, it is not clear who did. Previously, Pane has adamantly denied that he runs Bio-Recovery, and it could not be determined who exactly has been in charge.', 'Before Pane got involved, the company was founded by a man named Ron Gospodarski. He died in 2013 and left the company to his sister, Fran Gospodarski Senko. Fran', 'that Pane duped her into selling the company name and other assets after telling her that he was good friends with Gospodarski. Fran said she signed over the company this past New Year\xe2\x80\x99s Eve. Pane was there and orchestrated the sale, she said, but the paperwork named a company called Vinmar Associates as the buyer.', 'Dye told BuzzFeed News she worked at Vinmar Associates with Sal Pane starting in October 2013, when, she said, Pane promised to make her CEO of the company in a year. She said that she stayed until April 2014 and that she was working with Pane when Vinmar bought Bio-Recovery.', 'In late January 2014, Bio-Recovery', 'a \xe2\x80\x9cBiennial Statement\xe2\x80\x9d with the New York Department of State, declaring a new address and a new president and CEO: Christine Dye. It\xe2\x80\x99s this document that bears the signature that Christina Dye says is not hers.', 'Shortly after Dye left Vinmar and Bio-Recovery, she founded a company called Brooks Remediation and', 'to that firm\xe2\x80\x99s incorporation documents. The signature is clearly different from the one given for Bio-Recovery. Asked about this, Dye said that the Brooks Remediation signature is correct, the Bio-Recovery signature is not hers, and she knew of no one else at the company with a name similar to hers. She also said she never held the title of CEO or president while at Bio-Recovery.', 'She said she is no longer associated with Pane and has not spoken with him since she left to start her own company. She declined to comment further.', 'Dye was publicly listed as Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s CEO and president until August, four months after her departure. That month, the company', 'declaring that a Louis Caliendo was the CEO.', 'Then, in October,', 'was filed. It said that Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s CEO is a Stephen Robert Clarno. According to news reports, Clarno worked at Amerimod, Pane\xe2\x80\x99s loan modification company that was found to have violated the law and misled many of its customers. Clarno has not responded to multiple messages to his Facebook account seeking comment. A phone number listed for him is no longer in service, and BuzzFeed News was unable to locate an email or physical address for him.', 'In January 2010, Pane filed a request for a name change in Westchester County Supreme Court. In his application, he declared that he needed to change his name because a man named Sean Murphy had been harassing and threatening him. \xe2\x80\x9cMy safety/well-being is in jeopardy,\xe2\x80\x9d he', '.', 'At the time Pane applied to change his name, the civil case against him for scamming his mortgage customers was pending, as was the criminal case against him stemming from the drunk driving incident. Yet Pane left', '\xe2\x80\x94 the one where he was asked if he had any \xe2\x80\x9cactions pending\xe2\x80\x9d against him \xe2\x80\x9cin any court of this state or of the United States.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cThat should have been filled out,\xe2\x80\x9d David Bookstaver, spokesperson for New York State\xe2\x80\x99s Office of Court Administration, told BuzzFeed News.', 'Regardless, the judge', ', legally changing Pane\xe2\x80\x99s name to Enzo Pagani.', 'Pane and Bio-Recovery did not respond to a detailed letter seeking comment on the name change and on the Dye signature. Reached by telephone, Pane asked, \xe2\x80\x9cWhat\xe2\x80\x99s today\xe2\x80\x99s story?\xe2\x80\x9d After being asked if Christina Dye was Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s CEO, he hung up.', 'To contact the authors, write to', 'or', '.', 'Key Signature From Con Man\xc3\xa2\xc2\x80\xc2\x99s Ebola Firm May Be Fake', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! You'll get your first email soon.", 'Thanks for sharing.', 'Please try again later.']

Title: Ebola Cleanup Company Removes ‰ÛÏCertifications‰Ûù From Website After BuzzFeed News Investigation
Description: ['Bio-Recovery Corp. claimed to be \xe2\x80\x9cEPA licensed\xe2\x80\x9d and won a contract to clean up the New York City apartment of an Ebola patient.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', 'But after', ', some of those claims have disappeared from its website.', '', '', 'The company New York City hired to clean up Ebola has erased some of its \xe2\x80\x9ccertifications\xe2\x80\x9d from some of its web pages, after a', 'raised questions about whether it was qualified to do the cleanup.', 'Until recently, Bio-Recovery Corp.\xe2\x80\x99s website claimed to be \xe2\x80\x9cEPA Licensed\xe2\x80\x9d and an \xe2\x80\x9cEPA Certified Hazardous Waste Hauler\xe2\x80\x9d in multiple places. BuzzFeed News\xe2\x80\x99 story found no evidence that the company had any active permits and revealed that Sal Pane and his crew showed up to clean up the Harlem apartment of Ebola patient Dr. Craig Spencer with a truck bearing permits that belonged to a dead man.', 'Pane has a long and colorful history of telling falsehoods. In 2010, Pane was found', 'for running a mortgage company that scammed customers. BuzzFeed News\xe2\x80\x99 examination found that he has used fake names and made false claims to inflate his credentials, gained credibility from media interviews, and accumulated a trail of people who feel he exploited them when they were vulnerable.', 'Bio-Recovery Corp. used to be owned by a former paramedic named Ron Gospodarski, until he died in 2013. Gospodarski\xe2\x80\x99s sister told BuzzFeed News that Pane duped her into selling the company name.', 'Contacted Friday, Pane hung up on BuzzFeed News after being asked about the changes. He has not responded to last week\xe2\x80\x99s investigation, but an attorney for Bio-Recovery sent a statement to', 'that alleged BuzzFeed News\xe2\x80\x99 story \xe2\x80\x9cwas replete with false statements, lies and outright falsehoods.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Nevertheless, the company website, at least, has gone back on some claims about its credentials. In multiple places, under \xe2\x80\x9cCertifications,\xe2\x80\x9d there is no longer the claim to EPA license or the EPA certification to haul hazardous waste.', 'In other places, though, the claims still appear. One', 'devoted to the company\xe2\x80\x99s credentials still states that the company is \xe2\x80\x9cEPA Licensed\xe2\x80\x9d and an \xe2\x80\x9cEPA Certified Hazardous Waste Hauler\xe2\x80\x9d. \xe2\x80\x9cBio Recovery Corp. has numerous Certifications and Licenses with organizations and associations such as OSHA, EPA, NYS, and DEC,\xe2\x80\x9d the page says.', 'But some changes have been made to that page, too. It used to say that the company had \xe2\x80\x9c19 years in business,\xe2\x80\x9d even though Bio-Recovery Corp. hadn\xe2\x80\x99t been founded by Ron Gospodarski until 1998. Now, it says the company has \xe2\x80\x9c15 years in business.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Here\xe2\x80\x99s how the company\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cEbola Decontamination\xe2\x80\x9d page used to look:', '', 'And here\xe2\x80\x99s how it looks now, without \xe2\x80\x9cEPA Licensed\xe2\x80\x9d or \xe2\x80\x9cEPA Certified Hazardous Waste Hauler\xe2\x80\x9d', '', 'Ebola Cleanup Company Removes "Certifications" From Website After BuzzFeed News Investigation', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! You'll get your first email soon.", 'Thanks for sharing.', 'Please try again later.']

Title: The Con Artist Hired To CleanåÊEbola
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', 'The wild story of how a mortgage scammer persuaded a dead man\xe2\x80\x99s sister to turn over his business, his truck, and his resume \xe2\x80\x94 and got a government contract to clean up Ebola. A BuzzFeed News investigation into a con artist\xe2\x80\x99s second act.', 'When New York City officials needed someone to disinfect the apartment of its first Ebola patient, they found someone who seemed to be made for the job. Sal Pane boasted decades of experience cleaning up extremely dangerous materials, including anthrax in 2001. Ebola was his time to shine. \xe2\x80\x9cThis is our Michael Jordan moment. The fourth quarter,\xe2\x80\x9d he told', '. \xe2\x80\x9cWhen everyone else says no, we show up.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'But when Pane and his Bio-Recovery crew showed up at Dr. Craig Spencer\xe2\x80\x99s home, they brought a truck bearing permit numbers that belonged to a dead man. Pane had duped the dead man\xe2\x80\x99s grieving sister into selling that truck, she said, as well as the company name. Pane then', '\xe2\x80\x94 despite the fact that the dead man\xe2\x80\x99s family, friends, and former co-workers said they had never known him to work with Pane.', 'Soon after Spencer\xe2\x80\x99s apartment was first cleaned, BuzzFeed News reported that Pane \xe2\x80\x94 who has', 'of the firm New York City hired to clean up a lethal pathogen\xe2\x80\x94', 'But now, further investigation has revealed that Pane has a long and colorful history of telling falsehoods. An examination of his past legal troubles and his current operation has found that he has a playbook: He uses fake names and makes false claims to inflate his credentials, gains credibility from media interviews in which he speaks of lofty ideals and glittering successes, and along the way accumulates a trail of people who feel he exploited them when they were vulnerable.', 'His story illuminates how, with enough audacity, a scammer can even land a job that\xe2\x80\x99s critical to public safety.', 'Pane and Bio-Recovery have', 'But BuzzFeed News could not find any evidence of this. Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s state permit to haul medical waste expired in 2012, before Pane was associated with the company.', 'Some of Pane\xe2\x80\x99s claims border on the ludicrous, such as his supposed decades of experience. \xe2\x80\x9cTwenty-seven years,\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cNot my first rodeo.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Twenty-seven years ago, Pane would have been four years old. Bio-Recovery did not exist.', 'The city says it is reviewing \xe2\x80\x9cthis situation,\xe2\x80\x9d but officials have defended Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s work cleaning Dr. Spencer\xe2\x80\x99s apartment. The company was hired because \xe2\x80\x9cthey had the requisite skills in blood and body fluid assessment and cleanup,\xe2\x80\x9d said Sam Miller, a city health department spokesman. The state Department of Health and Mental Hygiene checked on Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s work after it was done, the spokesman said, \xe2\x80\x9cand found the cleanup was successfully performed and executed.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'But New York may have been saved by Ebola itself. Deadly though it is, Ebola does not', 'on dry surfaces such as door handles and countertops. If an unqualified company had botched the cleanup of a hardier pathogen, then those viruses might have survived, infected other people, and sparked an outbreak.', '\xe2\x80\x9cThe risks are high if you don\xe2\x80\x99t know what you\xe2\x80\x99re doing,\xe2\x80\x9d said Ian Lipkin, a professor of epidemiology at Columbia\xe2\x80\x99s Mailman School of Public Health. \xe2\x80\x9cYou could become infected and set up a whole new chain of transmission that extends into the community.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Lipkin gave the SARS outbreak as an example. \xe2\x80\x9cYou have thousands of people that become infected from a single individual,\xe2\x80\x9d he said.', 'In a brief phone interview, Pane said he did not run Bio-Recovery but hung up before BuzzFeed News could ask about most of the points in this article. He did not respond to a detailed letter emailed to two addresses associated with him. The letter was also emailed to Bio-Recovery and an intermediary.', 'Before he ended the phone call, Pane bristled at questions about his past. \xe2\x80\x9cThere\xe2\x80\x99s real news out there,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. \xe2\x80\x9cGrow up.\xe2\x80\x9d He insisted that this article would not deter him. \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s not going to change the fact I\xe2\x80\x99m going to keep going to work every day and helping families,\xe2\x80\x9d Pane said. \xe2\x80\x9cEnjoy your smear campaign.\xe2\x80\x9d', '', 'Salvatore Pane Jr. first made his name during a different crisis. In 2008, during the height of the economic meltdown, Pane began giving interviews \xe2\x80\x94 to', '', 'and to', '\xe2\x80\x94 as a self-proclaimed mortgage expert. He also appeared in local media and', '.', 'said Pane had been a mortgage broker for 10 years. He was 25 years old.', 'He did have an impressive-sounding title: president of Amerimod, a company that promised loan modifications to families having trouble paying their mortgages. In an', ', he declared that company\xe2\x80\x99s mission was to help those in need: \xe2\x80\x9cWhen someone calls us, they are in trouble.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'The company grew quickly, and Pane apparently encouraged a light-hearted atmosphere. A', '', 'describes Pane \xe2\x80\x9criding around the office on a Segway scooter drinking Red Bull and exhorting agents to bring in customers.\xe2\x80\x9d A former employee', 'that every time someone hit certain targets, \xe2\x80\x9cwe\xe2\x80\x99d go out on the floor and hit a gigantic brass gong hanging from the ceiling.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Pane and Amerimod also', 'a number of different misleading or illegal tactics to acquire customers. They advertised a success rate of between 90% and 100%, even though by Pane\xe2\x80\x99s own accounting', '. They devoted much of their advertising budget to Spanish-speaking customers, then provided loan contracts that were only in English. And they took in up-front fees, then ducked their customers once those fees were collected.', 'The New York attorney general\xe2\x80\x99s office took notice, and filed a civil suit. In August 2009, a judge issued', 'against Amerimod, ordering the company to stop its illegal practices immediately. Later, Pane', '\xe2\x80\x9cpersonally liable for engaging in fraudulent and illegal acts.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'When BuzzFeed News first asked Pane in October about the lawsuit, he claimed that it had been filed against his father, who has the same name. When BuzzFeed News noted that', 'had given an age that matched his and not his father\xe2\x80\x99s, he corrected his statement to say the suit had been brought \xe2\x80\x9cagainst my father and me.\xe2\x80\x9d Court documents', 'the junior Pane as the \xe2\x80\x9cPresident, CEO, sole principal and shareholder\xe2\x80\x9d of Amerimod. The documents do not mention Pane\xe2\x80\x99s father.', 'Though the judge had issued an injunction, Pane still had a court battle to fight, on whether Amerimod would be forced to pay restitution, and whether Pane himself would be on the hook for that money.', 'But by then, Sal Pane was in a different kind of trouble.', '', 'On an early Wednesday morning in March 2009, a police officer in the Long Island town of East Garden City pulled over a gray Toyota four-door that was speeding and didn\xe2\x80\x99t signal a lane change. When he walked up to the driver\xe2\x80\x99s window,', '.', 'The driver told him his name was Mikal Sachana. He claimed to be a district attorney in Suffolk County, with a date of birth of Nov. 17, 1978. But he was unable to produce a driver\xe2\x80\x99s license. The officer', 'was against the law, and put him under arrest for driving under the influence.', '\xe2\x80\x9cDon\xe2\x80\x99t do this,\xe2\x80\x9d', '. \xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m married and have a kid and owe a hundred thousand dollars out in law school and my father died in 9-11-2001.\xe2\x80\x9d (Pane told BuzzFeed News he had been speaking about an ex-girlfriend\xe2\x80\x99s father: \xe2\x80\x9cYes, he died on 9/11,\xe2\x80\x9d Pane said.)', 'The driver also claimed to know two of Long Island\xe2\x80\x99s more prominent politicians, Nassau County Executive Tom Suozzi and Suffolk County Executive Steve Levy. \xe2\x80\x9cI have both their numbers in my phone,\xe2\x80\x9d', '. The officer did not budge, and put him in the back of his police car.', 'After the arrest, officers went through the man\xe2\x80\x99s wallet, and', 'a New York State driver\xe2\x80\x99s license: On it', 'the name \xe2\x80\x9cSalvatore Pane 2nd.\xe2\x80\x9d The license', 'following two previous drunk-driving convictions.', 'Pane took the case to trial. He was', 'when he drove to court, because his license was still suspended.', 'The jury', 'of false personation, driving while impaired, and felony aggravated unlicensed operation of a vehicle. He was sentenced to between one and three years in prison.', 'Pane was released in March 2011, having spent a total of nine months behind bars. At some time after that, by Pane\xe2\x80\x99s own account, he began to turn his life around. He also changed his name, from Sal Pane to Sal Pain \xe2\x80\x94 to get away from a stalker, he said. BuzzFeed News could find no record that he changed his legal name, and Pane did not respond to a letter that asked him for details of his name change.', 'He still fought his mortgage scam case, though in February 2012 a judge', 'a request from his own attorneys to withdraw from the case. Those attorneys, the judge noted, said Pane had intentionally given them incorrect contact information.', ', it came time to hammer out how much Pane and Amerimod owed their', '. The attorney general', 'for $5.26 million in restitution payments. Now representing himself, Pane', 'that he believed that restitution should be between $300,000 and $500,000. He', 'a 90% success rate.', 'The judge hired a \xe2\x80\x9cspecial referee\xe2\x80\x9d who granted the attorney general\xe2\x80\x99s amount. She also', 'an additional $7.25 million in civil penalties,', '. The referee also', 'Pane personally liable for the restitution and penalties.', 'It\xe2\x80\x99s not clear when Sal Pane got into the business of cleaning up dangerous chemicals.', 'In an interview for BuzzFeed News\xe2\x80\x99 first story, Pane said he had worked for a company called All Island Bio-Recovery going back to 2001. When contacted for this article, he hung up before he could be asked about his experience in the industry, and he didn\xe2\x80\x99t respond to subsequent questions sent by email.', 'State records', 'that an All Island Bio-Recovery Inc. was founded in April 2010, but it\xe2\x80\x99s not clear who that company belongs to \xe2\x80\x94 it\xe2\x80\x99s registered to Corporation Service Company, a', 'based in Albany that does processing for other companies. Messages left at the company were not immediately returned.', 'Ron Gospodarski\xe2\x80\x99s trajectory is', 'He founded Bio-Recovery in 1998, in Queens, after working for years as a paramedic. Having witnessed many gruesome scenes, he had figured out that there was a need for somebody with some specific expertise to clean it up.', 'It was a small company \xe2\x80\x94 Ron and a handful of employees, according to former employees including his right-hand man, Manny Sosa. Ron was known to go out on every call, usually with Sosa. In', 'on the Discovery Channel and', 'Gospodarski and Sosa are seen driving out to calls, including one where an overweight man had died on his couch.', '', 'In late 2001, soon after 9/11, people in the offices of several politicians and major media companies opened mail that contained traces of anthrax. Gospodarski', 'to help decontaminate the offices of ABC Studios. He collaborated with the owner of a similar company based in Ohio, run by a man named Fred Schutt. Contacted by BuzzFeed News, Schutt said he could not remember a man by the name of Sal Pane who worked on anthrax \xe2\x80\x94 nor did he recognize a picture of him.', 'Gospodarski was president of a national trade group, the American BioRecovery Association, for several years in the mid-2000s, said Dale Cillian, who became president after him. Cillian spoke with Gospodarski at least once a week, and they were close friends. \xe2\x80\x9cRon told me everything,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. Cillian knew about Gospodarski\xe2\x80\x99s co-worker, Manny Sosa, but never heard of anyone by the name of Sal Pane. Gospodarski \xe2\x80\x9cwould just be livid if he knew what was going on,\xe2\x80\x9d Cillian said.', 'Cillian described Gospodarski as an honest man in an industry where integrity is sometimes in short supply. \xe2\x80\x9cRon did things right, you know,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. \xe2\x80\x9cHe didn\xe2\x80\x99t overcharge.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'In a', 'from 2011, the camera follows Gospodarski and Sosa as they enter the homes of people in Queens and Long Island who had died of natural causes. He talks of how strange it feels to be a \xe2\x80\x9cvoyeur\xe2\x80\x9d into the final moments of a person\xe2\x80\x99s life. In one apartment, he starts doing the dirty dishes in the sink. He tells the camera that there was one thing about his job that affected him more than any other: \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s very, very sad when someone dies by themself.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Gospodarski got sick around 2011 and started looking frail. In April 2013, he died at the age of 51. He left behind two brothers and two sisters, and his dog, Skippy. Instead of flowers, his family asked that memorials be made in his name to a firefighter crew in the Buffalo area, where he was from, and the Ridgewood Volunteer Ambulance Corps, in Queens. He left everything in his will to his sister, Fran Gospodarski Senko.', 'About a month or two later, Fran got a call from Sal Pane.', '', 'First, Fran said, Pane asked her about her brother\xe2\x80\x99s unfinished business.', 'He claimed he was good friends with Ron, Fran told BuzzFeed News, and that though he worked for a different company on Long Island, the two often passed along calls to each other. Ron probably had some insurance claims that weren\xe2\x80\x99t completed, she remembered him saying. Did she have the password to his work account, she said he asked, and would she mind passing the claims along?', 'Fran said she did so and then told Pane she had to go because someone was coming to look at the ambulance that her brother used to own. Pane stopped her right there. \xe2\x80\x9cYou didn\xe2\x80\x99t sell it, did you?\xe2\x80\x9d she says he asked her. Pane, she recalled, told her he could really use an ambulance, and he\xe2\x80\x99d pay her a good price. Sure, Fran said, why not?', 'Pane drove up to the Buffalo area, where Fran lives, to pick up the ambulance. She remembered him telling her that he and his crew would paint a mural on the side of it, in honor of Ron. At the time, Fran told BuzzFeed News, \xe2\x80\x9cmy heart\xe2\x80\x99s just melting.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Pane, she said, now had his eyes set on Ron\xe2\x80\x99s old box truck too. Pane claimed that one of the permit numbers on the truck was just one digit different from his, she recalled. \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99ll be perfect,\xe2\x80\x9d she remembered him telling her. He paid her cash, she said.', 'That was the last Fran heard from Pane for a few months. When he called again, she said, he asked a favor of her. He told her that it would cost him between $15,000 and $25,000 to get a new permit number, she recalled. \xe2\x80\x9cIf you just sign the corporation over,\xe2\x80\x9d Fran said Pane told her, \xe2\x80\x9cit\xe2\x80\x99ll save me money.\xe2\x80\x9d Fran decided she would.', 'Pane came by on New Year\xe2\x80\x99s Eve. In front of a notary, Fran said, she signed a document he handed her, and then he gave her a check for $5,000. The check, she said, was from a company called Vinmar Associates, which was also named in the document. She said she cannot find the document and does not recall exactly what it said.', 'An EPA registry lists Vinmar Associates doing business as All Island Bio-Recovery, the company Pane told BuzzFeed News he worked for since 2001. The registry lists Pane as the operator and a Vincent Santella as the regulatory contact. The state DEC told BuzzFeed News that medical waste permits for two different companies by the name Vinmar Associates \xe2\x80\x94 one naming Santella as vice president, the other naming a Frank R. Aliazzo as president \xe2\x80\x94 had both expired.', 'Aliazzo has other ties to companies Pane is associated with. Bio-Recovery, Gospodarski\xe2\x80\x99s old firm, is currently registered to an address in Patchogue, New York. That address is a residential property owned by a company called Globex Realty, LLC. Globex, in turn,', 'to an address', 'Aliazzo.', 'Aliazzo spoke briefly with BuzzFeed News before his links to Vinmar Associates had been found. In that call, he said he was busy and referred questions to Pane. Aliazzo didn\xe2\x80\x99t respond to subsequent voicemail messages about Vinmar Associates.', 'Santella declined to comment.', 'Pane told BuzzFeed News he never bought Bio-Recovery, saying that \xe2\x80\x9cthe company will have tons of documentation showing I never bought it.\xe2\x80\x9d', '', 'When Ebola first hit the United States in late September of this year, Pane sprang into action. By early October he was making frequent', 'to discuss Ebola, a process he continued throughout the entire month.', 'On Oct. 1,', 'showing how to decontaminate an ambulance.', 'talking about the process of removing Ebola. The show introduced him as someone who \xe2\x80\x9cowns a hazardous waste removal company.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'As a Bio-Recovery staffer donned a hazmat suit, Pane told Fox News that insurance companies had, for the first time, balked at covering Bio-Recovery for cleaning up hazardous waste. \xe2\x80\x9cFor the past 27 years the company\xe2\x80\x99s been around we\xe2\x80\x99ve never had an issue,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. Gospodarski founded Bio-Recovery 16 years ago \xe2\x80\x94 not 27.', 'During several media appearances, Pane referred to the company\xe2\x80\x99s anthrax experience, sometimes in', '', '.', ', he described the cleanup as \xe2\x80\x9cone of the hardest processes I\xe2\x80\x99ve ever had to be a part of.\xe2\x80\x9d He also described himself as an experienced industry hand. \xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99ve been dealing with pathogens, bacterias, and terrorism types of anti-warfare for decades.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'With Ebola in the news, Pane became a star in demand. He gave a flurry of interviews on', ',', ',', ',', 'and', '.', 'Somewhere along the way, Pane', 'that his company had put together proposals for Texas authorities to do cleanup in Dallas, after the initial U.S. patient, Thomas Eric Duncan, died from the virus. But he didn\xe2\x80\x99t get the contract. \xe2\x80\x9cThe fact of the matter is it went to a local company with far less experience that was only open for two or three years,\xe2\x80\x9d Pane said. Pane also claimed the company that did that job was \xe2\x80\x9cunethical\xe2\x80\x9d and \xe2\x80\x9coff-protocol,\xe2\x80\x9d and that he had \xe2\x80\x9ccritiqued\xe2\x80\x9d the company \xe2\x80\x9cmany times with government officials, state officials, and media.\xe2\x80\x9d State and local agencies said they had no record of any proposal from Bio-Recovery.', 'But Bio-Recovery had better luck with New York City. On Oct. 23,', 'that Dr. Craig Spencer had become the city\xe2\x80\x99s first Ebola patient. He lived in Harlem and had gone bowling in Williamsburg in the days before he came down with the deadly virus.', '', 'City officials told BuzzFeed News they had to \xe2\x80\x9cmove swiftly\xe2\x80\x9d to make sure neither location was contaminated. They made an emergency purchase, meaning that they did not go through the normal bidding process where multiple companies compete for the work. They settled on Bio-Recovery.', 'On the morning of Oct. 24, as Spencer recuperated in the hospital, reporters gathered across the street from Spencer\xe2\x80\x99s apartment. Pane was seen in a baseball cap, wearing all black like the rest of the crew, with canisters and a gas mask slung over his shoulder. Bio-Recovery trucks parked on the curb, in front of the cameras, and one of the trucks showed the company\xe2\x80\x99s name \xe2\x80\x94 and its old address, from when Ron Gospodarski was still alive and ran it. It also prominently displayed a state \xe2\x80\x9cRegulated Medical Waste\xe2\x80\x9d permit number, 2A-545, and an EPA number of NYD986985414.', 'Both of those numbers were once registered to Gospodarski, and are now inactive. A state Department of Environmental Conservation spokesperson told BuzzFeed News that the 2A-545 number is for a permit to haul medical waste, and Bio-Recovery did not do any actual hauling and so was not operating under that permit.', 'At any rate, the day appeared to be a glowing success. \xe2\x80\x9cIt was definitely a cleanup job that needed to be done and we\xe2\x80\x99re happy that the city, ya know, used us again after doing the anthrax in 2001. We appreciate that the city allows us to keep doing it,\xe2\x80\x9d Pane', 'Then, a week later, Pane\xe2\x80\x99s real name \xe2\x80\x94 and his past \xe2\x80\x94 became public.', '', 'When BuzzFeed News exposed details of Pane\xe2\x80\x99s past, he continued to stick to his account that he had \xe2\x80\x9cworked under\xe2\x80\x9d Ron Gospodarski. \xe2\x80\x9cRon died, we all worked there,\xe2\x80\x9d he told BuzzFeed News.', 'That is a claim that people close to Ron \xe2\x80\x94 family, friends, and colleagues \xe2\x80\x94 all describe as untrue. \xe2\x80\x9cThey are not the company we were, and they were not the ones who did the anthrax cleanup,\xe2\x80\x9d said Manny Sosa, Ron\xe2\x80\x99s former right-hand man. \xe2\x80\x9cI have no idea who they are.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Ricky Deow, who was close to Ron and owned a company next door to his, had also never heard of Pane. \xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m sad they are taking the credit for something they never did,\xe2\x80\x9d he said.', 'Pane also denied to BuzzFeed News that he runs the company, but a former employee who asked to not to be named told BuzzFeed News that was not true. Pane avoided putting his name on company documents because his past might catch up with him, this person said, but he was very clearly in charge. That seemed clear to Ron Gospodarski\xe2\x80\x99s sister Fran too. \xe2\x80\x9cHe acted like the boss,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. The city health department told BuzzFeed News that Pane was its point of contact at Bio-Recovery.', 'Incorporation documents list Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s current CEO as Stephen Clarno. Clarno used to be a regional manager at Amerimod, according to news accounts. Clarno\xe2\x80\x99s Facebook account lists him as living in northeast Ohio, far from Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s Long Island address. Clarno did not respond to multiple requests to comment left on his Facebook page. A telephone number listed for him in public records was no longer in service, and BuzzFeed News could not find an email address for him.', 'Bio-Recovery is only one of several companies and nonprofits that are connected to each other, with similar websites, which all link back to Bio-Recovery. Some list addresses in', 'than New York, although they claim Ron Gospodarski\xe2\x80\x99s client list. One, the Crime Scene Clean Up Association, claims to be a nonprofit. But the company is not listed as tax-exempt according to state records and a searchable federal database of nonprofits.', 'On the association\xe2\x80\x99s', 'taken down last week, Pane is listed as one of the founders. The page also claimed that Bio-Recovery had a \xe2\x80\x9cchief medical officer\xe2\x80\x9d named Joe Monaco. Pane said in', 'that Monaco \xe2\x80\x9chas a double Ph.D., four masters\xe2\x80\x99, and teaches for the \xe2\x80\x94 courses for the Department of Environmental Conservation and the Environmental Protection Agency.\xe2\x80\x9d Spokespeople for both the federal EPA and the New York State DEC told BuzzFeed News that they have no indication Monaco ever taught classes with their agencies. BuzzFeed News could not find contact information for a Joe Monaco who fit the age range and other identifying details Bio-Recovery provided.', 'On the company\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cAbout\xe2\x80\x9d page, there is a picture of Schutt, who worked with Gospodarski on the anthrax cleanup, shaking hands with former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani. The picture identifies Schutt as Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cowner.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Schutt told BuzzFeed News that he used to run a different company with a similar name in Ohio. He said he remembers helping on the anthrax cleanup but doesn\xe2\x80\x99t remember Pane. \xe2\x80\x9cIt looks like he just copied and pasted my press releases,\xe2\x80\x9d Schutt told BuzzFeed News. \xe2\x80\x9cTell this Sal guy to take my stuff off his website.\xe2\x80\x9d (Update: After this story was published, mentions of Schutt were removed from Bio-Recovery\xe2\x80\x99s web site.)', '', 'Fran hadn\xe2\x80\x99t heard from Sal Pane for months when, she said, she got a call from him in late October. A reporter was on the other line, she remembered him saying. She said he asked her: Can we do a three-way call where you tell him I\xe2\x80\x99m a good guy?', 'She refused, and soon after that call, BuzzFeed News\xe2\x80\x99 first report on his past was published. Fran began to hear from some of Ron\xe2\x80\x99s friends, and she read the article.', 'Fran said she began to feel like she had let her brother down. \xe2\x80\x9cI was stupid,\xe2\x80\x9d she told BuzzFeed News.', '\xe2\x80\x9cI can\xe2\x80\x99t even grieve for my brother,\xe2\x80\x9d she said, \xe2\x80\x9cand he\xe2\x80\x99s out there pulling my corporation from underneath my nose.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Fran said she had no idea Pane planned to use her brother\xe2\x80\x99s name the way that he has. Nor did she realize that Pane had little association with him before his death. She\xe2\x80\x99s also angry that she never got to see a mural of her brother painted on the ambulance he used to own, as she said Pane had promised. \xe2\x80\x9cWhen you get scammed like this, I mean \xe2\x80\x94 I can\xe2\x80\x99t believe it,\xe2\x80\x9d Fran said.', 'Fran shared with BuzzFeed News some texts that she said Pane had sent her after Fran started asking some questions. They come from the same cell number that BuzzFeed News has used to reach Pane. In one of the texts, he told Fran that he thinks about Ron every day. \xe2\x80\x9cIf there\xe2\x80\x99s anything I can do just say it and it will be done,\xe2\x80\x9d he said.', 'In subsequent texts, he claimed that there are other owners of the company and that he was the \xe2\x80\x9conly one not scared to go in front of the media.\xe2\x80\x9d He said that several people in the company had \xe2\x80\x9cbetween 10-30 years experience.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'But he also said he was tired of \xe2\x80\x9call the bs,\xe2\x80\x9d and \xe2\x80\x9c2 seconds away\xe2\x80\x9d from quitting.', '\xe2\x80\x9cNo matter what I say,\xe2\x80\x9d he texted Fran, \xe2\x80\x9cit\xe2\x80\x99s not going to make you happy.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'How New York City Hired A Con Artist To Clean Up Ebola', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! You'll get your first email soon.", 'Thanks for sharing.', 'Please try again later.']

Title: GOP Congressman: Immigration Executive Action An ImpeachableåÊOffense
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cBut committing an impeachable offense and getting, ya know, the two-thirds in the Senate to convict are two different stories,\xe2\x80\x9d said Rep. Matt Salmon of Arizona.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Republican Rep. Matt Salmon of Arizona said today he believes unilateral executive action taken by the president to slow deportations of undocumented immigrants would be an impeachable offense.', '\xe2\x80\x9cWell Charles Krauthammer was asked that same question and I think, just recently on one of the news programs and I have to agree with him of course it would be,\xe2\x80\x9d Salmon said on', '.', 'He acknowledged, however, that the impeachment process would be politically difficult.', '\xe2\x80\x9cBut committing an impeachable offense and getting, ya know, the two-thirds in the Senate to convict are two different stories,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. \xe2\x80\x9cSo, I mean, we have to play the hand that we are dealt right now.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'The stream freezes after these remarks, but Salmon says, \xe2\x80\x9cI think are strongest hand\xe2\x80\xa6.wants to do something that we believe is unconstitutional, we should defund it. And he then doesn\xe2\x80\x99t have the money to be able to do it.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Here\xe2\x80\x99s the video:', 'GOP Congressman: Immigration Executive Action An Impeachable Offense', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Key GOP Senator Says He Thinks Obama‰Ûªs Attorney General Nominee Will Be Confirmed
Description: ['Sen. Orrin Hatch, a member of the Judiciary Committee, added, however, that the confirmation hearings should wait until the new Senate takes office in January.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch said Thursday he believes U.S. Attorney Loretta Lynch will get approved by the Senate to replace outgoing Attorney General Eric Holder, but that the confirmation process should wait until after the new Senate has taken office in January.', '\xe2\x80\x9cLooking at it, I have to say, she looks like she will be a good person,\xe2\x80\x9d said Hatch on the', '. \xe2\x80\x9cBut I think the newly-elected senators on both sides should have the privilege of voting for or against her \xe2\x80\x94 and I think most of them will probably vote for her. And it ought to be done in a way that has always been followed, since the Civil War.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Hatch is a member of the Senate Judiciary Committee, which holds the confirmation hearings for attorney general.', 'He noted that his assessment was made before any congressional vetting has taken place.', '\xe2\x80\x9cWell I do agree that, looking at it superficially, or cursorily, it looks to me like we would confirm Loretta Lynch. On the other hand, we haven\xe2\x80\x99t had a hearing, we haven\xe2\x80\x99t had a process like we should have for something this important. And especially after so many Republicans are, you know, very, very dissatisfied with the current leadership of the Department of Justice. And even some Democrats are dissatisfied with that, because that leadership has been plagued with scandal, as the president has tried to centralize more power within the Executive Branch. And as he, you know, tries to do that rather than work with Congress.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Lynch would be the first black woman to serve as the nation\xe2\x80\x99s attorney general, if confirmed.', 'Hatch isn\xe2\x80\x99t the first Republican senator to give Lynch say his first impression is that Lynch would get confirmed. Arizona Sen. John McCain', 'he also believed that he thought that the Senate would confirm Lynch but that it should be voted on by the new Senate.', "Key GOP Senator Says He Thinks Obama's Attorney General Nominee Will Be Confirmed", 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! You'll get your first email soon.", 'Thanks for sharing.', 'Please try again later.']

Title: Kentucky Democrat: Grimes Lost Votes By Not Admitting She Voted ForåÊObama
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cI think that \xe2\x80\x94 people, voters want to know where you stand, where you are, and they want to feel they can trust what you say.\xe2\x80\x9d']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'A Kentucky Democratic congressman says former Senate candidate Alison Lundergan Grimes hurt herself in the election by refusing to say whether she voted for President Obama.', '\xe2\x80\x9cI don\xe2\x80\x99t think the campaign was poorly run, I think they did a good job,\xe2\x80\x9d Rep. John Yarmuth said on the', 'Wednesday. \xe2\x80\x9cShe made some mistakes that hurt her, certainly with the generating enthusiasm among Democrats. And one of \xe2\x80\x98em was not admitting she voted for the president.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cSo, again, I think that \xe2\x80\x94 people, voters want to know where you stand, where you are, and they want to feel they can trust what you say. And I think that\xe2\x80\x99s been part of my strength, and I think that\xe2\x80\x99s where Alison probably lost a lot of ground.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Grimes lost her race to unseat incumbent Republican Sen. Mitch McConnell by more than 15% on election day.', 'Here\xe2\x80\x99s the audio of the interview:', 'Kentucky Democrat: Grimes Lost Votes By Not Admitting She Voted For Obama', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: McCain Gives Obama Attorney General Nominee A Tentative Thumbs-Up
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cAnd I would imagine from my first glance at her credentials that she would get approved by the Senate.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', 'This is a very outstanding young woman from everything that I can tell.\xe2\x80\x9d', '', 'Arizona Republican Sen. John McCain said Monday that based on his first impression, he assumes U.S. Attorney Loretta Lynch will get approved by the Senate to replace outgoing Attorney General Eric Holder.', 'McCain called Obama\xe2\x80\x99s nominee and the chief federal prosecutor in the Eastern District of New York an \xe2\x80\x9coutstanding young woman.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cI think elections have consequences and therefore you give his nominees the benefit of the doubt, it doesn\xe2\x80\x99t mean you\xe2\x80\x99re a rubber stamp,\xe2\x80\x9d McCain said on the', '. \xe2\x80\x9cI voted in favor of some of his nominees who I would never have submitted to the Senate, but that\xe2\x80\x99s our job, advise and consent.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'McCain added he believes a confirmation should wait, however, until the new Senate begins in January.', '\xe2\x80\x9cAgain, why not wait until you have a new Senate where we can look at this with some time to examine; it\xe2\x80\x99s one of the most important positions there is. And I would imagine from my first glance at her credentials that she would get approved by the Senate. This is a very outstanding young woman from everything that I can tell.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'If approved, Lynch would become the first black woman to serve as the nation\xe2\x80\x99s attorney general.', 'McCain Gives Obama Attorney General Nominee A Tentative Thumbs-Up', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Ben Stein: America‰Ûªs Race Problem Is ‰ÛÏPathetic, Self-Defeating Black Underclass‰Ûù
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cI mean, the real problem with race in America is a very, very beaten-down, pathetic, self-defeating black underclass that is \xe2\x80\x94 uh, just can\xe2\x80\x99t seem to get its way going in the way that blacks were able to before the scourge of drugs and the scourge of gangs.\xe2\x80\x9d']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Actor and conservative pundit Ben Stein says the real problem with race in America is a \xe2\x80\x9cvery, very beaten-down, pathetic, self-defeating black underclass.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cIf you read the liberal mainstream media, that the main problem with race in America was poor innocent black people being set upon and mistreated by the police,\xe2\x80\x9d Stein', 'that the mother of Michael Brown could face felony armed robbery charges for attacking people in Ferguson, Missouri. \xe2\x80\x9cThat\xe2\x80\x99s just nonsense.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cI mean, the real problem with race in America is a very, very beaten-down, pathetic, self-defeating black underclass that is \xe2\x80\x94 uh, just can\xe2\x80\x99t seem to get its way going in the way that blacks were able to before the scourge of drugs and the scourge of gangs.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'The former game show host and Nixon administration official cited drugs and family destruction as a \xe2\x80\x9ccrisis in the black community\xe2\x80\x9d that President Obama has not addressed.', '\xe2\x80\x9cI mean, it\xe2\x80\x99s an amazing thing \xe2\x80\x94 blacks were on their way in this country, even after the horrors of slavery, and then drugs came in, the destruction of families came in, and the crisis in the black community is just absolutely unbelievable. And that, it seems to me, is something that Mr. Obama could have addressed, and he just ignored it completely.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'During', 'Fox News Sunday last week, Stein called Obama \xe2\x80\x9cthe most racist president there has ever been in America.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Ben Stein: America\'s Race Problem Is "Pathetic, Self-Defeating Black Underclass"', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! You'll get your first email soon.", 'Thanks for sharing.', 'Please try again later.']

Title: GOP Congressman: "Impeachment Would Be A Consideration" If Obama Acts On Immigration
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cImpeachment would be a consideration, yes sir.\xe2\x80\x9d']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'A Republican congressman says impeachment would be on the table if President Obama acts unilaterally on immigration by taking executive action to slow deportations.', '\xe2\x80\x9cWell impeachment is indicting in the House and that\xe2\x80\x99s a possibility,\xe2\x80\x9d said Texas Rep. Joe Barton on NewsMaxTV\xe2\x80\x99s', '. \xe2\x80\x9cBut you still have to convict in the Senate and that takes a two-thirds vote. But impeachment would be a consideration, yes sir.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'The White House has said in the past they will take executive action to slow deportations before the end of 2014, but the date of such an action has remained unclear.', 'Here\xe2\x80\x99s the video of Barton\xe2\x80\x99s remarks:', 'GOP Congressman: "Impeachment Would Be A Consideration" If Obama Acts On Immigration', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Senator Grassley Explains His Odd Dairy QueenåÊTweet
Description: ['Ice cream.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Twitter was abuzz this week when Republican Sen. Chuck Grassley of Iowa sent this strange tweet about Dairy Queen.', 'Windsor Heights Dairy Queen is good place for u kno what', 'Now, Sen. Grassley is explaining what he meant by \xe2\x80\x9cu kno what.\xe2\x80\x9d', '', '\xe2\x80\x9cI meant this, I\xe2\x80\x99m at Dairy Queen, Windsor Heights, Dairy Queen,\xe2\x80\x9d Grassley said in a video posted on YouTube by Iowa ACB5 reporter Samantha-Jo Roth. \xe2\x80\x9cI wanted to give Windsor Heights Dairy Queen some credit for making good Dairy Queen and doing you know what. And what do you do at Dairy Queen, you eat Dairy Queen.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cWell normally I have a Blizzard, Reese\xe2\x80\x99s, or Snickers but this particular time I had just plain vanilla and chocolate ice cream.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Mystery solved.', 'Senator Grassley Explains His Odd Dairy Queen Tweet', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Democratic Senator Blames ‰ÛÏLack Of Leadership From The White House‰Ûù For ElectionåÊLosses
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cThis was a national wave,\xe2\x80\x9d Sen. Manchin said.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Democratic West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin on Wednesday blamed the big losses suffered by his party in Tuesday\xe2\x80\x99s midterm elections on what he called \xe2\x80\x9ca national wave\xe2\x80\x9d of Americans lacking confidence and faith in the White House.', '\xe2\x80\x9cThis was a national wave,\xe2\x80\x9d Manchin told NPR. \xe2\x80\x9cIt is where it is. I can\xe2\x80\x99t camouflage it, can\xe2\x80\x99t cover it up. It is what it is and it was a lack of leadership from the White House that people didn\xe2\x80\x99t just have confidence and faith and it just spilled over as a national wave across.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Manchin earlier in the interview shot down speculation he planned to switch parties and become a Republican, declaring, \xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m a proud West Virginia Democrat.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Here\xe2\x80\x99s the audio of Manchin\xe2\x80\x99s remarks on NPR:', 'Democratic Senator Blames "Lack Of Leadership From The White House" For Election Losses', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Anti-Gay Congressman-Elect‰Ûªs Radio Program Vanishes From TheåÊInternet
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cThis video is private.\xe2\x80\x9d']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Congressman-elect Jody Hice\xe2\x80\x99s radio program appears to have been scrubbed from the internet. Hice the founder of the Culture and Values Network and the host of The Jody Hice Show was elected to Congress in Georgia Tuesday evening to replace outgoing Rep. Paul Broun.', 'the show\xe2\x80\x99s archived episodes from the Internet Archive or the show\xe2\x80\x99s website', '\xe2\x80\x9cthis video is private\xe2\x80\x9d message.', '', 'Every archived episode of the show comes up as private.', '', 'also now redirects to Facebook\xe2\x80\x99s homepage.', 'Hice,', 'being gay is equivalent to drug addiction and alcoholism, believes being gay is a choice, and that the \xe2\x80\x9chomosexual movement\xe2\x80\x9d is \xe2\x80\x9cdestroying America\xe2\x80\x9d and removing all morals captured 66% of the vote last night in Georgia\xe2\x80\x99s 10th district.', "Anti-Gay Congressman-Elect's Radio Program Vanishes From The Internet", 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great!
