Title: Twitter User Live-Tweeted The Start Of U.S. Airstrikes InåÊSyria
Description: [', claiming to be in Raqqa, Syria, appears to have shared the news of the airstrikes by the U.S. and partner forces on ISIS targets in Syria nearly 30 minutes before being confirmed by the Pentagon.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '1.', 'On Monday night, the', 'in Syria. The first person to report those strikes appears to be this Twitter user:', 'Breaking: Huge explosions shook the city in what might be the beginning of US airstrikes on ISIS HQs in Raqqa', '2.', 'After several of minutes, he tweeted again, saying, \xe2\x80\x9csounds of warplanes can be heard clearly.\xe2\x80\x9d', "The airstrikes 5/6 concentrated near the 'governorate building' ISIS's main HQ. Meanwhile, sounds of warplanes can be heard clearly", 'Reports of similar airstrikes on Tabga town and brigade 93 in Ein Essa.', '4.', 'A spokesman for the Pentagon officially confirmed the airstrikes on ISIS roughly 30 minutes later:', 'US military & partner nation forces have begun striking ISIL targets in Syria using mix of fighters, bombers and Tomahawk missiles.', '5.', 'Hariri shared two more tweets, one saying, \xe2\x80\x9cThe sky is full drones over Raqqa now,\xe2\x80\x9d before going dark:', 'The sky is full drones over Raqqa now', '7.', '', '', 'buzzfeed.com', 'Twitter User Live-Tweeted The Start Of U.S. Airstrikes In Syria', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Man Attempting To Visit Every Country In The World Captures Terrifying Armed Robbery OnåÊVideo
Description: ['\xe2\x80\x9cI miraculously happened to be recording with a gopro on my forehead and captured this amazing piece of footage!!\xe2\x80\x9d']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '1.', 'A man on a mission to visit every country in the world was recently on a bike tour of Argentina when he captured the terrifying moment an armed thief attempted to rob him in broad daylight.', '2.', 'In a', 'by the group Global Degree, Alexander Hennessy is seen riding along a bike path in Buenos Aires when a stranger on a motorcycle suddenly drives up beside him and pulls out a handgun.', '\xe2\x80\x9cI miraculously happened to be recording with a gopro on my forehead and captured this amazing piece of footage!!\xe2\x80\x9d said the video\xe2\x80\x99s description.', '3.', 'After Hennessy briefly escapes the man who confronted him with a laugh, he\xe2\x80\x99s forced to stop pedaling, and attempts to ditch his bike and make a run for it. The armed thief can be heard yelling repeatedly: \xe2\x80\x9cGive me the backpack!\xe2\x80\x9d', '4.', 'Michael Graziano, who shared the video on Tuesday night, said the person riding the bike in the video was his travel partner Hennessy.', "While it's not our proudest footage, it certainly is jaw-dropping. Watch Alexander Hennessy get robbed at... http://t.co/CWzS25t9UM", 'Graziano', 'the footage was later handed over to police and the would-be robber was arrested the same day.', '\xe2\x80\x9cBut this won\xe2\x80\x99t stop us from visiting all 195 countries,\xe2\x80\x9d he said.', '6.', 'Watch the complete video of the incident here:', 'Man Attempting To Visit Every Country In The World Captures Terrifying Armed Robbery On Video', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: SpaceX Rocket Explodes During Test Flight InåÊTexas
Description: ['The F9R test vehicle was launched Friday from the company\xe2\x80\x99s facility in McGregor, Texas.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '1.', 'Twitter user', 'that her boyfriend took this photo of a rocket exploding after launching from a SpaceX facility in McGregor, Texas.', '#spaceX rocket blew up :(', '2.', 'The eyewitness reported that grass fires were ignited by the falling rocket debris.', '@weeddude grass fires from debris', "Space X's rocket falling out of the sky in pieces!!", '4.', 'Debris can be seen falling from the sky from this video posted to YouTube:', '5.', '', 'showing the rocket launch and termination:', '8.', 'Police currently have the road blocked off to the Texas facility.', '9.', 'SpaceX confirmed the rocket termination in a statement to BuzzFeed via email:', '\xe2\x80\x9cEarlier today, in McGregor, Texas, SpaceX conducted a test flight of a three engine version of the F9R test vehicle (successor to Grasshopper). During the flight, an anomaly was detected in the vehicle and the flight termination system automatically terminated the mission.', 'Throughout the test and subsequent flight termination, the vehicle remained in the designated flight area. There were no injuries or near injuries. An FAA representative was present at all times.', '', 'With research and development projects, detecting vehicle anomalies during the testing is the purpose of the program. Today\xe2\x80\x99s test was particularly complex, pushing the limits of the vehicle further than any previous test. As is our practice, the company will be reviewing the flight record details to learn more about the performance of the vehicle prior to our next test.', '', 'SpaceX will provide another update when the flight data has been fully analyzed.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'SpaceX Rocket Explodes During Test Flight In Texas', 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Nothing in the video indicated the drone hit anything either, according to law enforcement who viewed the footage after visiting the man\xe2\x80\x99s hotel room.', '3.', 'An amazing view of the Space Needle and the Seattle skyline:', '4.', 'Tourists on the Space Needle are seen waving to the drone as it flies next to the landmark:', '5.', 'Another beautiful shot of the Seattle skyline:', '6.', 'As the drone is seen hovering over the observation deck, people again wave back:', '7.', 'As the drone leaves the Space Needle you are given one last view of the Seattle skyline:', '8.', '\xe2\x80\xa6and after it is all over the drone flies back home to its owner and hotel room:', '9.', 'You can watch the full video here:', "Drone Captures Stunning Images Of Seattle's Space Needle, Ends In Visit From The Cops", 'Your link was successfully shared!', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', 'More Buzz', 'Note: once you save these links, they will no longer update automatically.', '', '', '', '', 'by', '', 'This cannot be undone.', 'BuzzFeed is currently working with select partners to help them track what\xe2\x80\x99s hot on their sites using the same advanced social tracking and analytics tools used on BuzzFeed.com.', 'If you\xe2\x80\x99re interested, contact us at', '.', "Please select the newsletters you'd like to receive.", 'Your email has been sent!', 'Get our awesome newsletter at', "Great! Title: Apple CEO Tim Cook: ‰ÛÏI‰Ûªm Proud To BeåÊGay‰Ûù
Description: ['The CEO of Apple said he identifies as gay in an', 'Thursday for Bloomberg BusinessWeek.']
Body: ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Apple CEO Tim Cook in Beijing on Oct. 23.', 'Apple CEO Tim Cook', 'that he identifies as gay in a personal essay for Bloomberg BusinessWeek published Thursday.', '\xe2\x80\x9cWhile I have never denied my sexuality, I haven\xe2\x80\x99t publicly acknowledged it either, until now. So let me be clear: I\xe2\x80\x99m proud to be gay, and I consider being gay among the greatest gifts God has given me,\xe2\x80\x9d Cook wrote.', 'He said that, over the years, he told many people about his sexual orientation. \xe2\x80\x9cPlenty of colleagues at Apple know I\xe2\x80\x99m gay, and it doesn\xe2\x80\x99t seem to make a difference in the way they treat me,\xe2\x80\x9d he wrote, adding that he was \xe2\x80\x9clucky\xe2\x80\x9d to work at a company that is accepting of him.', 'Cook has fiercely guarded his privacy even as he runs one of the world\xe2\x80\x99s most recognized companies. But, he wrote, he felt that desire for privacy was holding him back \xe2\x80\x9cfrom doing something more important.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cBeing gay has given me a deeper understanding of what it means to be in the minority and provided a window into the challenges that people in other minority groups deal with every day,\xe2\x80\x9d Cook wrote, adding that it gave him the confidence \xe2\x80\x9cto rise above adversity and bigotry.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s also given me the skin of a rhinoceros, which comes in handy when you\xe2\x80\x99re the CEO of Apple,\xe2\x80\x9d he said.', 'Human Rights Campaign President Chad Griffin said the announcement \xe2\x80\x9cwill save countless lives.\xe2\x80\x9d The group called it a \xe2\x80\x9ccourageous step forward.', '\xe2\x80\x9cIn doing so, he committed himself to using the influence that comes with heading of one of the world\xe2\x80\x99s largest corporations to fight for the rights and equality of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) people across America,\xe2\x80\x9d HRC said.', 'Cook', 'for LGBT rights, and recently', 'his home state, Alabama, for being \xe2\x80\x9cstill too slow on equality.\xe2\x80\x9d He specifically pointed to an Alabama law that allows employers to fire workers based on sexual orientation.', 'Auburn University, Cook\xe2\x80\x99s alma mater in Alabama, said the university community \xe2\x80\x9cwas proud of Tim as a student, and we\xe2\x80\x99re proud of him as a distinguished alum and member of the Auburn family.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Former President Bill Clinton', 'From one son of the South and sports fanatic to another, my hat\xe2\x80\x99s off to you, @Tim_cook.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'In the BusinessWeek piece, he mentioned \xe2\x80\x9cmany places where landlords can evict tenants for being gay, or where we can be barred from visiting sick partners and sharing in their legacies.\xe2\x80\x9d', '\xe2\x80\x9cSo if hearing that the CEO of Apple is gay can help someone struggling to come to terms with who he or she is, or bring comfort to anyone who feels alone, or inspire people to insist on their equality, then it\xe2\x80\x99s worth the trade-off with my own privacy,\xe2\x80\x9d he wrote.', 'Hedge fund manager Whitney Tilson called it a \xe2\x80\x9cseminal moment when the CEO of the most valuable company on the planet\xe2\x80\xa6comes out. And not just by quietly acknowledging it, but with a full-throated roar, saying it\xe2\x80\x99s helped him in his career.\xe2\x80\x9d', 'Earlier this year, a CNBC anchor', 'said on air that Cook was \xe2\x80\x9copen\xe2\x80\x9d about being gay \xe2\x80\x93 a comment that was met with silence by fellow panelists.', '3.', 'An outpouring of support \xe2\x80\x93 for Cook and Apple \xe2\x80\x93 followed the announcement:', "From one son of the South and sports fanatic to another, my hat's off to you, @Tim_cook. http://t.co/1dXvRa2Nhu", '@tim_cook Proud of my friend and colleague! http://t.co/PzABpsoWWH', "So inspired by @tim_cook's courage this morn. He is beloved in his home state of Alabama where many LGBT young ppl need this kind of hope.", '10.', '', '', 'buzzfeed.com', 'A St. Petersburg city council member said cook should be banned from the country. \xe2\x80\x9cWhat could he bring us?
